title: Linux iptables Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the powerful iptables firewall tool in Linux. Learn to manage firewall rules, implement advanced configurations, and secure your network with practical examples.

meta.title: Linux iptables Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the powerful iptables firewall tool in Linux. Learn to manage firewall rules, implement advanced configurations, and secure your network with practical examples.
meta.keywords: iptables, Linux firewall, network security, firewall rules, advanced iptables configurations

verify.name: Verify iptables rules
verify.hint: Ensure that the rule to block traffic on port 80 is present in the iptables rules.

verify.name: Verify iptables rules
verify.hint: Ensure that the rule to allow SSH traffic (port 22) is present and the rule to block traffic on port 80 is removed in the iptables rules.

verify.name: Verify port forwarding rule
verify.hint: Ensure that the rule to forward traffic from port 8080 to port 80 on the local machine is present in the iptables NAT table.

verify.name: Verify NAT masquerade rule
verify.hint: Ensure that the rule to masquerade outgoing traffic from the default interface (eth0) is present in the iptables NAT table.
